altername_name: ROM^2 Karaoke Vol. 5: Karaoke Maku no Uchi
name: Rom Rom Karaoke: Volume 5: Karaoke Mako no Uchi
overview: Rom Rom Karaoke Vol. 5: Karaoke Mako no Uchi is a karaoke game, developed by Victor Interactive Software and published by NEC Interchannel, which was released in Japan in 1990.
